Function Documentation

void MCTM_ChannelNConfig ( HT_TM_TypeDef *  MCTMx,
TM_CH_Enum  Channel,
TM_CHCTL_Enum  Control 
)

Enable or Disable the MCTMx channel N.

Parameters:
MCTMx,:where MCTMx is the selected MCTM from the MCTM peripheral.
Channel,:Specify the MCTM channel. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • MCTM_CH_0 : MCTM channel 0
  • MCTM_CH_1 : MCTM channel 1
  • MCTM_CH_2 : MCTM channel 2
  • MCTM_CH_3 : MCTM channel 3
Control,:This parameter can be TM_CHCTL_ENABLE or TM_CHCTL_DISABLE.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 120 of file ht32f5xxxx_mctm.c.

void MCTM_ChNPolarityConfig ( HT_TM_TypeDef *  MCTMx,
TM_CH_Enum  Channel,
TM_CHP_Enum  Pol 
)

Configure polarity of the MCTMx channel N.

Parameters:
MCTMx,:where MCTMx is the selected MCTM from the MCTM peripheral.
Channel,:Specify the MCTM channel. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • MCTM_CH_0 : MCTM channel 0
  • MCTM_CH_1 : MCTM channel 1
  • MCTM_CH_2 : MCTM channel 2
  • MCTM_CH_3 : MCTM channel 3
Pol,:Specify the polarity of channel N. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • MCTM_CHP_NONINVERTED : active high
  • MCTM_CHP_INVERTED : active low
Return values:
None

Definition at line 74 of file ht32f5xxxx_mctm.c.

Definition at line 210 of file ht32f5xxxx_mctm.c.

void MCTM_COMUSConfig ( HT_TM_TypeDef *  MCTMx,
MCTM_COMUS_Enum  Sel 
)

Configure the MCTMx COMUS function.

Parameters:
MCTMx,:where MCTMx is the selected MCTM from the MCTM peripherals.
Sel,:Specify the COMUS value. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • MCTM_COMUS_STIOFF : MCTM capture/compare control bits are updated by setting the UEV2G bit only
  • MCTM_COMUS_STION : MCTM capture/compare control bits are updated by both setting the UEV2G bit or when a rising edge occurs on STI
Return values:
None

Definition at line 238 of file ht32f5xxxx_mctm.c.
